_comments.azure_ad_auth: tenantId and clientId are used for Azure AD authentication in Cribl Stream destinations. Client secret is referenced via Cribl secret name configured in CriblDestinationExample.json.
_comments.discovery_scope: The script will scan all subscriptions accessible by your current Azure session for storage accounts containing vNet Flow Log containers (insights-logs-flowlogflowevent)
_comments.required_permissions: Your Azure App Registration needs 'Storage Blob Data Reader' role on each storage account to access vNet Flow Logs from Cribl
